fullText: The musical adaptation brings emotional depth to the familiar story of addiction and recovery, with Kelli O'Hara delivering a powerhouse performance that anchors the production's most affecting moments.
dtliExcerpt: The musical adaptation brings emotional depth to the familiar story of addiction and recovery, with Kelli O'Hara delivering a powerhouse performance that anchors the production's most affecting moments.
bwwExcerpt: Always a composer of intricacy, Mr. Guettel mostly eschews traditional musical-theater forms and simplified melodies; his lyrics here are sometimes conversational, sometimes fragmentary, reflecting the characters’ muddled psyches and their conflicting desires: for the high and the happy blur of booze, but also stable ground upon which their marriage can right itself.
